KSL, I have no clue why you're so bent on killing me. But you're gunna have 
one hell of a time trying.
Also, Yan's drawing is very good. I think it looks cute, in a fluffy kitten 
sort of way.
Why, it's around the same level of goodness as my own.


* Iron Raptor was keeping a close eye in Nemisis while she still kept her 
attention on Scattershot, suddenly snapping her head towards Nemisis as he 
powered up his bosters and made his clumsy get away.
Simply standing there and not even bothering to waste the energy it might 
take to either chase him down or to use what was left in the sword.
Iron Raptor let the blade of the sword rest against the ground where Nemisis 
had been only moments before, sighing and shaking her head.
She really didn't want his fluid on her blade anyway, she would rather have 
soneone else kill him. But if it ever came down to it, she would take his 
life.
Iron Raptor looked over her shoulder as Scattershot spoke, turning towards 
him a bit as he finished his words.
She still had HIM to take care of!
Her eyes widened as she hard him yell, jumping a bit out of the way as the 
explosive charges landed a bit in front of her, but not before a few shruck 
her in the shoulders and chest.
A bit of armor flew away from those places before she stumbled back, 
gritting her teeth as mech-fluid flowed from the new wounds.
Glaring at Scattershot she tightened her hold on the handle of the sword.*

" Just what are you bots doing here anyway? Just felt like causing pain and 
trouble?"

* Iron Raptor hefted her sword and the blade glew a little, but she knew 
that she used up most of her energy in the last blast.
Now she just had enough for Scattershot if it came down to it.
But she really didn't care aboy beating him to a pulp right now, all she 
wanted was for the battle to end so they could all relax.
Though, there wasn't much chance of that!*
